description: For Black Diamond™ NRG or NRG2 battery pack. Super handy for road trips or on your way to the trailhead or camp, so you can keep your Icon headlamp or Apollo or Orbit LED lantern (not included) juiced up.Plugs into any car's 12-volt socket.LEDs indicate charging status.Works with 2012 and earlier Orbit lanterns.
name: Black Diamond NRG/NRG2 Car Charger
